data.name: Stock Car Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Stock Car Simulator is a racing game featuring f1 Stock Cars from the UK and Netherlands in full contact short oval racing! Drivers are subject to a grading system and their wing colour is painted a different colour to show the grade they are.

Do you have what it takes to win?

Features
  • Real world Tracks from the UK & Netherlands
  • Steering wheel and force feedback support
  • Time of day system
  • Weather system
  • Customisable car colours & drivers
  • All the wing grades
  • Championship mode
  • Single race mode
  • Time attack mode
  • Practice mode

*Features subject to change as full features are finalised.

data.short_description: Race powerful f1 stock cars on short oval tracks
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel i5, AMD Ryzen or similar
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB (GeForce 950GT / AMD R9 270)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: These System Requirements will change as we continue development
